statements: DELETE FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM public_sector_employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'HR';
DELETE FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'Human Resources' AND position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM employee_addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM employee_training_records WHERE course_name = 'Java Programming' AND instructor = 'John Doe';
